snippet: The unexplained murders of three members of a British family and a Frenchman in an isolated corner of rural France have dominated headlines in both countries. The two governments have pledged to co-operate to find the perpetratators of what looks...
abstract: The unexplained murders of three members of a British family and a Frenchman in an isolated corner of rural France have dominated headlines in both countries. The two governments have pledged to co-operate to find the perpetratators of what looks like a professional assassination.

headline.main: Murder Mystery Stuns France and Britain
